examples.sentence: Corrected: 明々後日、会議があります (Asatte no tsugi no hi, kaigi ga arimasu) - The day after tomorrow, there is a meeting.
examples.english: There is a meeting the day after tomorrow.

examples.sentence: 贅沢な暮らしをします

examples.sentence: この顔に見覚えがあります

examples.english: I waited for tens of years.

examples.english: I jump down from the window.

examples.romaji_meaning: Michi (Road) ga tsukou dome (traffic stopped) desu (is)

examples.sentence: 通行止めにご注意ください
examples.romaji: Tsukou dome ni go chuui kudasai

examples.english: Please be careful of the traffic closure.

examples.romaji_meaning: Michi (Road) ga iki domari (dead end) desu (is)
examples.english: The road is a dead end.

examples.sentence: いつの間にか春になりました

examples.english: Before I knew it, it became spring.

examples.sentence: いつの間にか時間が経ちました
examples.romaji: Itsu no ma ni ka jikan ga tachimashita

examples.english: Before I knew it, time passed.
I am sensitive to the air.

examples.romaji: Kare wa henka ni binkan desu
examples.romaji_meaning: Kare (He) wa henka (change) ni binkan (sensitive) desu (is)

examples.sentence: 今更言われても遅いです
examples.romaji_meaning: Imasara (Now, at this late stage) iwarete mo (even if told) osoi (late) desu (is)
examples.english: It's too late to be told now.

examples.sentence: 今更やろうとしても無理です
examples.romaji: Imasara yarou to shite mo muri desu
examples.romaji_meaning: Imasara (Now, at this late stage) yarou to shite mo (even if try to do) muri (impossible) desu (is)
examples.english: It's impossible to try to do it now.

examples.sentence: 今更言っても遅いです
examples.romaji_meaning: Imasara (Now) itte mo (even if I say) osoi (late) desu (is)
examples.english: It's too late to say it now.

examples.english: It's a bit late, but please.

examples.romaji_meaning: Renjitsu (Day after day) mousho (intense heat) ga tsuzukimasu (continues)
examples.english: Intense heat continues day after day.

examples.english: Many people visited day after day.
